verses.verse: <S%H1984>Praise<s%> you the <S%H3050>Lord<s%>. <S%H1984>Praise<s%> you the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; <S%H1984>praise<s%> <S%H5650>him<s%>, O you servants of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
You that <S%H5975>stand<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, in the <S%H2691>courts<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%>,
<S%H1984>Praise<s%> the <S%H3050>Lord<s%>; for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%>: sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> unto his <S%H8034>name<s%>; for it is <S%H5273>pleasant<s%>.
For the <S%H3050>Lord<s%> has <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> unto <S%H3478>himself<s%>, and Israel for his peculiar <S%H5459>treasure<s%>.
For I <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%>, and that our <S%H113>Lord<s%> is above all <S%H430>gods<s%>.
Whatever the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2654>pleased<s%>, that <S%H6213>did<s%> he in <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and in <S%H776>earth<s%>, in the <S%H3220>seas<s%>, and all deep <S%H8415>places<s%>.

He causes the <S%H5387>vapors<s%> to <S%H5927>ascend<s%> from the <S%H7097>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>; he <S%H6213>makes<s%> <S%H1300>lightnings<s%> for the <S%H4306>rain<s%>; he <S%H3318>brings<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%> out of his <S%H214>treasuries<s%>.
Who <S%H5221>struck<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, both of <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>animal<s%>.
Who <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H226>signs<s%> and <S%H4159>wonders<s%> into the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of <S%H4714>you<s%>, O Egypt, upon <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and upon all his <S%H5650>servants<s%>.
Who <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%>, and <S%H2026>killed<s%> <S%H6099>mighty<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%>;
<S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, and <S%H5747>Og<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, and all the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>:
And <S%H5414>gave<s%> their <S%H776>land<s%> for a <S%H5159>heritage<s%>, a <S%H5159>heritage<s%> unto <S%H3478>Israel<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%>.
Your <S%H8034>name<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, endures for <S%H5769>ever<s%>; and your <S%H2143>memorial<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, throughout <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%>.
For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H1777>judge<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%>, and he will <S%H5162>repent<s%> himself concerning his <S%H5650>servants<s%>.
The <S%H6091>idols<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> are <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold<s%>, the <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>'s <S%H3027>hands<s%>.
They have <S%H6310>mouths<s%>, but they <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H5869>not<s%>; eyes have <S%H7200>they<s%>, but they see not;
They have <S%H241>ears<s%>, but they <S%H238>hear<s%> <S%H3426>not<s%>; neither is there any <S%H7307>breath<s%> in their <S%H6310>mouths<s%>.
They that <S%H6213>make<s%> them are like unto <S%H982>them<s%>: so is every one that trusts in them.
<S%H1288>Bless<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%>:
<S%H1288>Bless<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%>: you that <S%H3373>fear<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> out of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>, which <S%H7931>dwells<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>. <S%H1984>Praise<s%> you the <S%H3050>Lord<s%>.
